title: WRATH OF THE BALROGS - Third Age Total War Reforged Mod Gameplay
description:
WRATH OF THE BALROGS - Third Age Total War Reforged Mod Gameplay - Hey guys! Today we are checking out some new units in the Reforged Sub-mod. A great Rhunic army will be facing a great evil!  The Lesser Balrogs!  Enjoy the Battle :D

Mod Link: http://www.moddb.com/mods/third-age-reforged

Reforged Discord: https://discord.gg/rnNXfDd

JOIN MY DISCORD SERVER: https://discord.gg/JjR7UR3

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
